stimulusHtml:
You will be asked to speak in Chinese on a specific topic. Imagine you are making an oral presentation to your Chinese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as complete as possible.


Choose ONE difference between a practice in Chinese culture and in another culture (what color clothing to wear for a wedding or a funeral, sharing dishes when dining out versus ordering individual meals, living in a multi-generational family versus in a nuclear family, etc.). In your presentation, describe this cultural difference and explain its significance or importance.
